Articles.Content:
Hello there, KSP-forums! New guy has arrived!

He of course has a name...

*ahem*

Greetings, ladies and gentlemen! I am Hogbobson.

I love this game.

That is all.

See you around.
Welcome to this black ho- I mean, tropical paradise!

Welcome to KSP's forums! You can escape Kerbin, you could try to escape Kerbol, but you may never escape KSP itself!

(Seriously, you've got to have discipline around this game and its associated forum, or you can spend hours on it you needed for something else.)
